title: 820-01987 ppdcin_g3h is 5v
message: it was  5v on both usb-c ports and now it's 20v on one port  and 5v on the other. the 20v is .7A and then slowly drops to 0 amps. the 5v port stays at .25 amps. i triied dfu and it didn't work but maybe it will now that the 20v port is sort of working

title: 820-01987 ppdcin_g3h is 5v
message:
Follow all the tutorial steps.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/how-to-collection.60974/[/URL]
Be sure to connect the cable on correct port!

You may have a problem with the port stuck at 5V.
However, try DFU first.
